name: Only You Can Permit The Application
name_original: Only You Can Permit The Application
description:
Even though outside the heroes are fighting for the safety of our city, I dare to say that the real heroes are actually sitting in our department making decisions for the good of our city - within budget.

Featuring (maybe poisoned) cake, snakes and of course Princess Metroid.

Easy to play, just click :)

Please post yout favorite character in the comments.
